headline: HAS Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that Hasbro, Inc. Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
summary: NEW YORK, Nov. 26, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Attorney Advertising -- Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC, a nationally recognized law firm, notifies investors that a class action lawsuit has been filed...

headline: Class Action Filed Against Hasbro, Inc. (HAS) Seeking Recovery for Investors - Contact Levi & Korsinsky
